Question: Later that month, this person organized a set of "this person & Friends" benefit concerts in Germany and Korea.
Hints: Steven Hoefflin, who performed this person's second rhinoplasty and subsequent operations.
This person performed 82 concerts in 58 cities to over 4.5 million fans, and grossed a total of $165 million.
This person was inducted onto the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 1980 as member of The ____s and in 1984 as solo artist.
